== CRM Packaging ==

We decided on trying to packaging <nowiki>[[http://civicrm.org/|CiviCRM]]</nowiki>. Currently there is no progress on this.

More info about it: http://en.flossmanuals.net/CiviCRM/

The packaging currently lives in https://code.launchpad.net/~ubuntu-ngo/civicrm/ubuntu
{{{
sudo apt-get install bzr bzr-builddeb devscripts build-essential cdbs
bzr branch lp:~ubuntu-ngo/civicrm/ubuntu civicrm
cd civicrm
bzr bd -- -us -uc}}}

I pushed some _very_ early work to <nowiki>[[https://code.launchpad.net/~ubuntu-ngo/+junk/frontlinesms| lp:~ubuntu-ngo/+junk/frontlinesms]]</nowiki>. <nowiki>[[Andrewsomething]]</nowiki>
